snippet.title: Revival: Recolonization x Atomic Heart - Official Crossover Gameplay Teaser Trailer
snippet.description: Revival: Recolonization is a post-apocalyptic 4X strategy game that is having a crossover with action hit first-person shooter Atomic Heart. The Twins and RAF-9 (AKA Raffik) from Atomic Heart will be featured in Revival: Recolonization with the Twins being a hologram that can be seen on the new anomaly named Holo Theater that provides bonus Reputation and Prosperity. The RAF-9 is a new hostile NPC that you can encounter that is designed to damage foes with acid. Revival: Recolonization is launching in Steam Early Access on June 28 for PC.
